title: Heavy Crossbows
content:
Heavy Crossbows in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Heavy Crossbows are Two-Handed Martial Ranged Weapons in BG3 that can only be two-handed, dealing 1-10 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 18m, and they deal Piercing Damage. Being a Ranged Weapon, note that you have disadvantage on attack rolls with Heavy Crossbows while Threatened.
